books.author: by Bob Woodward
books.description: Based on hours of interviews with sources, the Pulitzer Prize-winning journalist describes debates and decision-making within the Trump White House.
books.name: FEAR

books.author: by Tara Westover
books.description: The daughter of survivalists, who is kept out of school, educates herself enough to leave home for university.
books.name: EDUCATED

books.author: by John McCain and Mark Salter
books.description: A memoir by the recently deceased Republican senator from Arizona.
books.name: THE RESTLESS WAVE

books.author: by Yuval Noah Harari
books.description: Technological, political and social issues in the modern era, and the choices individuals might consider in facing them.
books.name: 21 LESSONS FOR THE 21ST CENTURY

books.author: by Omarosa Manigault Newman
books.description: The reality TV star and former White House staffer describes her time and relationship with Donald Trump.
books.name: UNHINGED

books.author: by Neil deGrasse Tyson and Avis Lang
books.description: Observations of the two-way relationship between science and military power.
books.name: ACCESSORY TO WAR

books.author: by Gregg Jarrett
books.description: The Fox News analyst makes his case against the F.B.I. investigation into collusion between the Trump campaign and Russia.
books.name: THE RUSSIA HOAX

books.author: by Yuval Noah Harari
books.description: How Homo sapiens became Earth’s dominant species.
books.name: SAPIENS

books.author: by Neil deGrasse Tyson
books.description: A straightforward, easy-to-understand introduction to the laws that govern the universe.
books.name: ASTROPHYSICS FOR PEOPLE IN A HURRY

books.author: by Greg Lukianoff and Jonathan Haidt
books.description: An investigation of cultural trends that the authors argue are failing the next generation.
books.name: THE CODDLING OF THE AMERICAN MIND

books.author: by John Kerry
books.description: A memoir by the former Massachusetts senator, secretary of state and 2004 Democratic presidential nominee.
books.name: EVERY DAY IS EXTRA

books.author: by Ken Starr
books.description: The former independent counsel recounts his investigation of the Clinton administration and its outcomes.
books.name: CONTEMPT

books.author: by John Carreyrou
books.description: The rise and fall of Theranos, the biotech startup that failed to deliver on its promise to make blood testing more efficient.
books.name: BAD BLOOD

books.author: by Angela Duckworth
books.description: A psychologist argues that passion and perseverance are the keys to success.
books.name: GRIT

books.author: by Jeanine Pirro
books.description: The legal analyst and Fox News host argues in favor of President Trump.
books.name: LIARS, LEAKERS AND LIBERALS
